title: Gunman in southern Iran opens fire at prominent Shiite shrine, killing 1 and wounding 8 others
description: TEHRAN, Iran — A gunman opened fire Sunday night at a prominent shrine in southern Iran, killing one person and wounding eight others in an attack that followed another assault there months earlier, authorities said.

title: Russian warship fires warning shots on cargo ship in Black Sea
description: A Russian warship fired warning shots with automatic weapons on a Palau-flagged ship in the Black Sea as it made its way towards Ukraine, the Kremlin said.

title: ‘Barbie’ triggers heated discussions over patriarchy and feminism in China
description: The“Barbie” movie has triggered discussions over patriarchy and feminism in China where there is awareness of gender inequality but also a social backlash.
